00191 // - Inlined functions
00192 
00193 inline bool
00194 CoveredIDsRequest::requestDone()
00195 {
00196    return (m_state == DONE) || (m_state == ERROR);
00197 }
00198 
00199 inline StringTable::stringCode
00200 CoveredIDsRequest::getStatus() const
00201 {
00202    switch ( m_state ) {
00203       case DONE:
00204          return StringTable::OK;
00205       case ERROR:
00206          return StringTable::NOTFOUND;
00207       default:
00208          return StringTable::TIMEOUT_ERROR;
00209    };
00210 }
00211 
00212 inline const CoveredIDsRequest::result_t&
00213 CoveredIDsRequest::getCoveredIDs() const
00214 {
00215    return m_resultIDs;
00216 }
